duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide engineered solutions for aircraft lavatory Mechanical systems that involve detailed design which include component design and/or component selection on assigned components.
Review specifications and requirements, identifying compliance differences and developing qualification documents.
Interact with customers, systems engineers, and program managers to address design and compliance issues.
Conduct and participate in tests to validate the robustness and proper performance of new product designs.
Work with management and supply chain to ensure testing happens as planned.
Interface w/suppliers, electrical engineering, system architects, ODM, quality, and other development groups to ensure the successful development and launch of new products.
3D routing of water and air hoses.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Aerospace or Mechanical Engineering from a four-year accredited college/university and 5 years of prior relevant experience OR Advanced Degree in a related field and minimum 3 years of experience OR In absence of a degree, 9 years of relevant experience is required.
